main.description: A publication record for cross-platform blog discovery and verification.

url.description: Required base publication URL (e.g., https://standard.site). The canonical document URL is formed by combining this value with the document path.

description.description: Optional brief description of the publication

icon.description: Optional square image to identify the publication. Should be at least 256x256.

basicTheme.description: Optional simplified publication theme for tools and apps to utilize when displaying content

preferences.description: Platform-specific preferences for the publication, including discovery and visibility settings.

showInDiscover.description: Boolean which decides whether the publication should appear in discovery feeds
